Data Driven Practice

29 Jan 2011

In 2010, I did a talk at the e-MDs User Conference:

Data Driven Practice with e-MDs

View more presentations from Jonathan Ploudre.

  • Crystal Reports and basic data dumps.
  • Excel to slice & dice data.
  • Visualizing data to make it more usable
  • Why change isn’t a technical problem (really a sociopolitical process)

Data Driven Practice (article)

Here’s a 2 minute video that shows how to do a custom report from scratch. (If you have trouble opening the video, consider getting VLC to play it.) This report shows how to find all the patients in the practice on 80mg of Simvastatin (Zocor) so you could respond to an FDA announcement.

Here’s 90 second video that shows 5 different reports off of a single set of data (Pivot Tables Rock!)

Juice Analytics 30 Days to Visualization
